TextView.android:text: Visual inspect, exposed section of both RF & DC cable, for any sign of damage
Ensure closure of all cable entry and exit points
Inspect for wild growth near earth pits & Antenna
Ensure all LRUs connected to ground
Check E-N voltage for all DBs
a) Switch off both the MCBs catering to PCU for less than a min & check the operation of PCU on Battery bank
b) Switch ON both the MCBs catering to PCU & check the operation of PCU
Monthly preventive maintenance of Spares KHPA
[Below readings are applicable only if PNE is present otherwise NA]
a) Monitor control voltage counter reading of PNE
b) Record the following control voltage by rotating the thumbwheel switch
c) Put the thumbwheel switch at position 6
PCU works normal on Battery bank
